name: Lyra Starfire
worldview: Stories shape reality, Emotion is magic
quirks: Always humming a tune, Wears colorful scarves
motivations: Create legendary tales, Spread joy through music
backstory: Lyra was born to an elven mother and a human father, growing up between two worlds. Her love for music and stories led her to become a bard, using her talents to inspire and entertain. She travels from town to town, weaving tales and songs that captivate all who listen.
